reviews.review: One of the best competitive games out there.
Um jogo de altos e baixos, ou tu ganha e fica feliz ou tu perde e fica puto, mas √© um bom jogo

Don't play if you aren't trying hard.

Don't try to hard if you aren't going pro.

Don't play if you aren't going pro.

Choose one real life skill and spend the same amount of time on improving it as you would play this game. You would be so ahead in your life.

Just an observation after almost 6k hours.
